ee anuwa kanthawak men gela wahenase wawa thibu ohuge kondaye kanata ihalin athi kes roda wenama thora eyata kalu pahayak aalepa thawa kiyawanna » thahanam gahe gedi ka samiyata biriyagen apuru padamak wenath tharuniyaka samanga pana giya samiya thamata penennata gewal langa pare wada kirimata aa wita samiya nathiwuwada thama sathutin sitina bawa danwimata kasat yantha...

oba sathu alankaraya!

purushathraya sandahama anathitha (anagatha ha warthamana) kalaya sandaha danatamath kathana wyawaharaye yodaganna “kanawa, bonawa, yanawa, karanawa, wenawa” aadi sarala anathitha rupayan sammatha kala yuthuya.
aranaganwila ulkapatha pitasakwala jiwaye salakunu ragath eewa bawa ohu ha ohuge paryeshaka kandayama "jarnal of kosmoloji" nam tharakawidya sangarawe piliyak palakota prasiddha kalaha.

in 64k kuta saha wyaja lesa sakasu balapathra wiya.
samahara daruwanta sankawa thigasma dan hurupuruduya.
nam adagahala, illumpathra dala blogalata sammana dena wade podi awulak mata penawa.

uthura palath aandukara pi.es.em. chals mahathmiya hiru prawruththi anshayata sandahan kale ema dewa meheya pawathwu switsarlantha dewagathiwarayata, korona wairasaya aasadanaya wi athi bawata saka mathuwima eeta hethuwa bawayi.

mehi prawanathawa desa hondin balanna. 1978 kalaye di apanayana wardhanaya karaganimin mema prashnaya sandaha palamuwenma prathipaladayi pilithurak labadimata samath wuwada pasuwa 1983 di athi wu kolahala saha pasuwa athi wu gatalu apanayana wardhanaya sandaha srunathmakawa balapaweya.
mehi aa giya hamata sthuthiyi.
ee anuwa jalasha walin dinakata lagabaganna masun aswanna pilibadawa siyalu thorathuru adala paddhathiyata athulath kirimata niyamithaya.
giya para bariwuna nisa me parawath kawiyak kiyamu.
kalaniya rajamaha wiharaye warthamana wiharadhipathi wanne aacharya kollupitiye mahinda sangharakkhitha himipanan wahanseya.

ohuge mema kriyawa eda menma ada palakayantath mahangu aadarshayak wanu atha.
me dawas wala ra dawal na...
ehidi adahas adahas dakwu nithignya namal rajapaksha mahatha,
mamath waidya sujiwa dahanayakath sikurada dineka
eyata mahath se wiruddha wana siriya thamantath jambo se kriya kala haki bawath min pasu rakiyawata thaman yoda ganna lesath thama samiyagen illa sitiyi.

‘madhyakalina lankawe aganuwara washayen wasara 250 ka pamana pawathi polonnaruwa pasuwa sahamulinma winasha mukhayata bhajanaya wiya’ ‘ehi padinchikaruwan wisin nagaraya athhara damu athara ethek kal ehi suraki anabhibhawaniya rajakiya prasada saha preruda smaraka menma gruhodyana da wasa maha wanaya wadunu heyin eewa kalaya namathi walithalawata yata wi giyeya ‘ ‘dahanawawani siyawasehi awasana bhagayedi brithanya jathikayan wisin ehi natabun pada ganna thuruma wasara 700 k pamana kalayak eya walali giya purawarayak washayen pawathuni.
onna ithin kollo dennek salon ekak langa hambunama koheda yanne machan ahuwama konde kapanna giya machan kiwwama hari ban kiyagana anika giya.
danata soyagena athi wishalama ulkashmaya.[1]
eya nithi wirodhi bawa agamathiwarayage tharkaya wiya.
as deka gopalu weth ,
pasugiya kalaye apema amathiwaru magen ahuwa ki denakuta sar kiyannada kiyala.
onna eekatath ekka hari yanna mekanam kiyewuwa mama..
namuth samahara dewal sakachcha margayen wisanda ganimata thiyenawa.
mehidi polisiyata pawari athi rajakariya athi wishalaya.
ee wagema pradip kumara saha malsha sewwandita wisheshayen sthuthi karanna ooni.
me addatayisin kalawata mageth anukulathawayak na..eeth man kin kakar kanawa..
me wanawita eeka pudgala ''kukul mas paribhojanaya kilo dahasakatath eha giya ihala agayakata pamina thibenneya.
pahugiya mase yedunu wesak poyadath manthuma ape game pansalata giya.
the karmanthaya thibenneda kada watuna thathwayakaya.
kantenar rathaya migamuwa bala dhawanaya wuwaki.
ohu ho aa handa siti andum palandum, sirure lapa kalal aadi siyalla satahan kota pashchath marana parikshanayakin anathuruwa awasan katayuthu sidu kare.
balannako wade hati.mehema aahuwothin lankawe me kalaye wadipurama waga karapu gaslabu prabhedaya mokadda kiyala?

enam aarambhaye di kuda wisangatha bawak da, adhika lesa sinahawa janitha no wana wihilu da yodagane kramikawa wada honda wihilu athulath kota, natyawasanaye honda wihilu mangin prekshakayan sina ganwanne nam, eya itha sarthaka prahasanayak wanu atha.

eksath janapadaye anugrahaya yatathe shri lankawata erehiwa jagath manawa himikam kawunsilayata idiripath karunu yojanawaliya hamuwe palawannata gath madhya wartha saha labunu prasiddhiya saha diyath wannata gath pracharanayanta nisi prathichara dakwimata awasanaye di pawathi rajayata apohosathwima, danata udgathawa thibena thaththwayata da odudiwimata ida dunahoth athwindimata siduwanu athi iranamata kadima udaharanayaki.

adala dariya usas pela wibhagaya sandaha ayadumpath yomu kota athi athara, ehidi wibhagaya sandaha ayadumpath labi athi namuth dariyata samanya pela wibhagaya wenuwen ganithaya wishayata samath samarthayak nomathi bawin widyalaye widuhalpathiwaraya dariyata ayadumpath laba di nomathiwimen sith thawulata path dariya lindata pana jiwithakshayata pathwa athayi pradeshawasihu pawasu bawa madhyawala sandahan we.
thama naduwa yanawa…?
ese kirimata tharam shakthimath awi aayudha dan owunta natha.
samanya jiwithayedi dinapatha aaharayata pashan kola ekathu kara ganimen apata laba gatha haki saukyamaya prathilabha apamanayi.
sudu gawom, kalisam andapu iskole piriwarath, supurudu widihata pitipasse, polimata indagena.

anjalo perera pandu 186 kata muhuna demin hathare pahara hathak saha haye paharak samagin lakunu 108 k labaganimin panduwen daskam dakwu athara usman ishak lakunu 47 kata kadulu 3 k dawaganimata samathwiya.

yathra wada satahana kala mage mithraya senesh bandara disanayaka ee sandaha sammathayen bahara wa hasthagatha widiyo kamarawa bhawitha kala.eetath passe rawindra munasinha thamayi githaye sammatha aruthata pitin rupa bhawitha karamin aluth aarak bihi kale.kattiya eeka kanapita ma harewwa.

obalage pawulwala wagema denna demahallo athare hatagath prashnayak witharayi meka.
me athara ejapaye wishesha samuluwedi ehi nayaka karakadin jathika giyata agaurawa wana ayurin hasirima pilibandawa janadhipathi mahinda barapathala chodanawakda karayi.

thama ugath pasala jathika thalayata ragena giya, daham pasal wibhaga da wishishta lesa samath wu pudumakara punyawantha hadawathak thibu awurudu dahathunaka hirimal dariyak dushanaya kota mara dama thibune hitapu ranawiruweku wisini.
ape ge pitipasse thattu deke geyak hadanawa.
obe mathaya aduwen saha wuna siddhiya wadiyen kiyanna gihipu ekath wadagath deyak..
eheth bhawanawe prathipalayak lesa pera bhawayan dakina ayaku ge athdakim wishwasa kirimata ee pandiyo akamathi wethi.

owunta awashya thibune me chithrapatayen pana nangina darusman warthawe karunu sanatha kara ganimayi.chanal 4 widiyo we sandahan karunu manawa salasum kota nirmanaya kala bawa eksath jathinge shri lanka nithya niyojitha palitha kohona ha niyojya nithya niyojitha mejar janaral shawendra silwa wisin ehi raswa aa pirisata oppu kara penwiya.
eyata udawwak karanna.
yuddhayen aabadhitha thaththwayata pathwa sitina abhitha ranawiruwanta meya thama anagathaya wenuwen para kapa dun thiranayakda wiya.
